casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Ricky Charles HOWELL No. 323P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 27, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Ricky Charles Howell, for Howell, Ricky Charles.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 26th of September 2018 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wilkes County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of September 2018."
